TopicTitle: Any plugins that make your kerbal stand up while in a moving ship?

Articles.Content: I noticed when attempting to recreate the Red Bull jump from space with the Hooligan Labs balloons that even though I stopped the ship in mid air and was just floating the kerbal just fell over when I went on EVA. Like I was free falling. Are there any mods/plugins that will make them stand up?

I wish...

Or maybe seasickness cure will work in this case?
